content: Should this stream be renamed to something like "Blue Button Patient Financial Reporting"?

Hi Grahame,

Is there a reason the current name doesn't work? Also would changing the name affect the links to the stream we've already posted elsewhere?

Regards,
-Amol Vyas
changing the name won't affect the links or I wouldn't have asked. The current name... I'm just tracking the discussion about the name of the implementation guide

Understood. Per that discussion, I believe "CARIN IG for Blue Button®" works as well?
@Ryan Howells @Mark Roberts @Pat Taylor
CARIN for Blue Button® IG is approved by ONC and will work
One small tweak. It is actually CARIN IG for Blue Button®. Can you make that the stream name?

you should also have a description that explains all of that for those that ( a ) don't know what CARIN is, and ( b ) understand the Blue Button that has been defined by the VA and used for 10 years https://www.va.gov/bluebutton/; with structured and coded forms in C-CDA
Great points, John. We've tried to do that in the narrative to the extent possible.
no need to change the name from "CARIN Blue Button IG" to "CARIN IG for Blue Button" from my pov - they're close enough. but we can change it if we need to

Grahame I know that the names are very close, but ONC has asked that we change the reference everywhere so as not to confuse/infringe on the trademark. If you could please change it to CARIN IG for Blue Button® and include the ® that would be ideal. thanks!
